headline: Baker Hughes Announces Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2025 Results
summary: Fourth-quarter highlights Orders of $7.9 billion, including $4.0 billion of IET orders.Record RPO of $35.9 billion, including record IET RPO of $32.4 billion.Revenue of $7.4 billion, flat year-over-year.Attributable net income of $876 million.GAAP diluted EPS of $0.88 and adjusted diluted EPS* of $0.78.Adjusted EBITDA* of $1,337 million, up 2% year-over-year.Cash flows from operating activities of $1,662 million and free cash flow* of $1,341 million. Full-year highlights Orders of $29.6 billion,

content.title: Baker Hughes Announces Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2025 Results
content.summary: Fourth-quarter highlights Orders of $7.9 billion, including $4.0 billion of IET orders.Record RPO of $35.9 billion, including record IET RPO of $32.4 billion.Revenue of $7.4 billion, flat year-over-year.Attributable net income of $876 million.GAAP diluted EPS of $0.88 and adjusted diluted EPS* of $0.78.Adjusted EBITDA* of $1,337 million, up 2% year-over-year.Cash flows from operating activities of $1,662 million and free cash flow* of $1,341 million. Full-year highlights Orders of $29.6 billion,
